DOC.brief_summary: 1 ) evaluate treatment fidelity DRRP : study design , training interventionists , delivery receipt intervention , application intervention real-life setting ; 2 ) identify successful strategy participant recruitment maintain active participation ; 3 ) collect analyze preliminary indicator DRRP 's effect dietary intake , physical activity , stress response , body weight ; 4 ) To evaluate sample representativeness target audience , implementation acceptability DRRP , attrition rate .
DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Study Diabetes Risk Reduction Program With WIC Mothers ( The Special Supplemental Nutrition Program Women , Infants , Children ) Overweight WIC Mothers
DOC.criteria: Nonpregnant woman 18 34 year old understood speak English measure BMI 25.0 39.9 kg/m2 eligible study . Additional inclusion criterion include young child 6 week 3.5 year age enrol one three collaborate WIC location , plan become pregnant change WIC clinic study , provide accurate contact information , agree notify researcher change contact information pregnancy status , willingness accept randomized participation assignment , willing participate project 1.5 year , consent blood glucose test via finger stick . woman fast blood glucose great 126 mg/dl random blood glucose great 200 mg/dl , selfreported type 1 2 diabetes eat disorder , inability walk one block without rest shortness breath exclude . Eligible participant provide individual telephone address telephone number one backup contact ( relative , friend , neighbor ) .
